item.title: Neat new features of Fortran 2018
item.description: Assumed Rank Arrays One new feature includes assumed rank arrays. real(real64) function f(x) real(real64), intent(in) :: x(..) select rank (x) rank (*) error stop "Function not defined on assumed-size arrays" rank (0) f = abs(x) rank (1) f = sum(abs(x)) rank (2) f = sqrt(sum(x**2)) rank (3) f = sum(abs(x)**3)**(1/3.0d0) rank (4) f = sum(x**4)**(0.25d0) rank default error stop "Function not supported for rank>4 (unstable)" end function
